entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
